## post-me package

Use web Workers and other Windows through a simple Promise API

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [BareMessenger](./post-me.baremessenger.md) |  |
|  [ConcreteEmitter](./post-me.concreteemitter.md) | A concrete implementation of the [Emitter](./post-me.emitter.md) interface |
|  [PortMessenger](./post-me.portmessenger.md) | A concrete implementation of [Messenger](./post-me.messenger.md) used to communicate with a MessagePort. |
|  [WindowMessenger](./post-me.windowmessenger.md) | A concrete implementation of [Messenger](./post-me.messenger.md) used to communicate with another Window. |
|  [WorkerMessenger](./post-me.workermessenger.md) | A concrete implementation of [Messenger](./post-me.messenger.md) used to communicate with a Worker. |

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ChildHandshake(messenger, localMethods)](./post-me.childhandshake.md) | Initiate the handshake from the Child side |
|  [debug(namespace, log)](./post-me.debug.md) | Create a logger function with a specific namespace |
|  [DebugMessenger(messenger, log)](./post-me.debugmessenger.md) | Decorate a [Messenger](./post-me.messenger.md) so that it will log any message exchanged |
|  [ParentHandshake(messenger, localMethods, maxAttempts, attemptsInterval)](./post-me.parenthandshake.md) | Initiate the handshake from the Parent side |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Connection](./post-me.connection.md) | An active connection between two contexts |
|  [Emitter](./post-me.emitter.md) | A simple event emitter interface used to implement the observer pattern throughout the codebase. |
|  [LocalHandle](./post-me.localhandle.md) | A handle to the local end of the connection |
|  [Messenger](./post-me.messenger.md) | An interface used internally to exchange low level messages across contexts. |
|  [RemoteHandle](./post-me.remotehandle.md) | A handle to the other end of the connection |

## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [CallOptions](./post-me.calloptions.md) | The options that can be passed when calling a method on the other context with RemoteHandle.customCall() |
|  [EmitOptions](./post-me.emitoptions.md) | The options that can be passed when emitting an event to the other context with LocalHandle.emit() |
